title: Cloud Certifications
meta: These certifications validate my expertise in cloud technologies, specifically Azure and Oracle. My credentials include: Azure AZ-900, Azure AI-900, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified Developer Professional, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified Foundations Associate, Oracle Cloud Data Management Certified Foundations Associate, and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified DevOps Professional.
text: Azure AZ-900: View Certification, Azure AI-900: View Certification, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified Developer Professional: View Certification, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified Foundations Associate: View Certification, Oracle Cloud Data Management Certified Foundations Associate: View Certification, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified DevOps Professional: View Certification.

title: Python Programming Course
text: Fundamentals of Python programming, including data types, variables, control structures, functions, and modules. The course provided a strong foundation for further learning and development in the Python language.
